$ZIM Here's the response I received from ZIM regarding buyback:

Thank you for your email and for being a ZIM shareholder. ZIM management is committed to creating enduring shareholder value and a critical component of this is returning capital to shareholders. We have indicated in the past that until today
created_at: we opted to promote return of capital to shareholders with dividends
column3: in accordance with the dividend policy and have taken steps to improve our policy to reward long term shareholders since going public in early 2021. Management and the board have considered and will continue to evaluate what is the best avenue to returning capital to shareholders
column5: until today opted for dividends. We will continue to work closely with our Board to ensure all options are thoroughly explored for the benefit of shareholders
